content: तपन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [तप्-ल्यु] {@--1@} Warming, heating, burning, shining &c. {@--2@} Causing distress, paining. {@--3@} The sun; प्रतापात्तपनो यथा <ls>R. 4. 12</ls>; ललाटंतपस्तपति तपनः <ls>U. 6</ls>; <ls>Māl. 1.</ls> {@--4@} The hot season. {@--5@} The sun-stone. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of a hell. {@--7@} An epithet of Śiva. {@--8@} The Arka plant. {@--9@} <ab>N.</ab> of Agastya. --नं {@--1@} Heat, burning. {@--2@} Paining, grieving. {@--3@} Mental agony, anguish.
